attributes.additional_details: Athe current political circumstances were unfoseable by the UK general public.   A new refferendum in light of the rapidly changing political and economic environment following the election of President Trump parliament is proceeding in the belief that they are acting upon the will of the people but these changes have what the people want and is a reasonable step to allow Britain to protect its political and moral integrity.
attributes.background: The world is a very different place than it was when the UK voted for Brexit.   It has become apparent that if Brexit goes ahead, then the UK would be closely allying itself to USA and the recent protests against President Trumps visit would indicate that the UK dosen't want that.
